_header: Full fair flower is the lily
Title(s): The Virgin Mary the Lily with Five Leaves
_description: The Virgin Mary the Lily with Five Leaves — twenty couplets

CamTCC323.First Lines:
Ful feir flour is þe lilieWid fif leuis hire sal
                    hulie…
CamTCC323.Last Lines:
…þer is blisse buten endeIhesu crist us þider
                    sende
CamTCC323.Editions:
Brown,  Carleton Fairchild,
                        ed.  
             English Lyrics of the XIIIth Century.
         Oxford: Clarendon, 1932: 29-30.
